name: Broccoli, Carrot and Snow Pea Slaw
keywords: broccoli, carrot, snow peas, dairy-free, gluten-free, nut-free, vegan, vegetarian, side dish
recipeIngredient: 12 medium-size broccoli stems, trimmed, peeled and julienned
5 medium-size carrots, trimmed, peeled and julienned
2 cups snow peas, trimmed and julienned
2 tablespoons plus 1 teaspoon fresh lemon juice

recipeInstructions.text: Bring a large pot of water to a boil. Add the broccoli, carrots and snow peas and blanch for 30 seconds. Drain, refresh under cold running water and drain again. Place in a large bowl. Add the remaining ingredients and toss to coat. Let stand for 1 hour. Divide among 4 plates and serve.
